snippet: During Super Bowl week in Indianapolis, a curling demonstration allows visitors the chance to kneel at the hack and learn the meaning of bonspiel.
abstract: During Super Bowl week in Indianapolis, a curling demonstration allows visitors the chance to kneel at the hack and learn the meaning of bonspiel.

headline.main: Everything Indy: A Little Bit of Curl Power
headline.print_headline: Everything Indy: Vying for Attention, The Thrill of the Glide
